SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

Class GamePhysics

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.controller.GamePhysics
public class GamePhysics extends Object
Manages the physics interactions and collision detection in the game.

The GamePhysics class handles the application of gravity to the player, checks for collisions between the player and platforms, and manages interactions between the player and other game objects such as snakes and fireballs.

    • checkCollisionX

      public boolean checkCollisionX(Player player, boolean movingRight)
      Checks for horizontal collisions between the player and platforms.
      Parameters:
      player - the player character
      movingRight - true if the player is moving right, false if moving left
      Returns:
      True if a collision is detected, false if it is not

    • checkCollisionY

      public boolean checkCollisionY(Player player, boolean movingDown)
      Checks for vertical collisions between the player and platforms.
      Parameters:
      player - the player character
      movingDown - true if the player is moving down, false if moving up
      Returns:
      True if a collision is detected, false if it is not

    • isCollision

      private boolean isCollision(double playerX, double platformX, int playerWidth, int platformWidth, double playerY, double platformY, int playerHeight, int platformHeight)
      Determines if a collision occurs between the player and a platform.
      Parameters:
      playerX - the player's X coordinate
      platformX - the platform's X coordinate
      playerWidth - the width of the player
      platformWidth - the width of the platform
      playerY - the player's Y coordinate
      platformY - the platform's Y coordinate
      playerHeight - the height of the player
      platformHeight - the height of the platform
      Returns:
      True if a collision is detected, false if it is not
